sentence: Brnovich announced Friday he had reached agreements with the State Bar of Arizona, which licenses and regulates attorneys, stemming from two ethics complaints filed against him and attorney general lawyers by Secretary of State Katie Hobbs, a Democrat vying for her party’s gubernatorial nomination, and the Arizona Board of Regents.
author: Yvonne Wingett Sanchez
title: McGuire calls on Brnovich to release records related Bar complaints

sentence: Secretary of State Katie Hobbs, the Democratic frontrunner, called on the Senate to raise the limit and save K-12 schools from "this manufactured funding crisis."
author: Jeremy Duda
title: No Republican candidates for Arizona governor are calling for school cuts to be stopped

sentence: We were told that the Party supported the bill, which has proven to be false and that this was intended to fix the utter mess Katie Hobbs has made of our election procedures for 2022.
author: Jordan Conradson
title: UPDATE: Arizona Republicans Look To Repeal Language In Bill Changing Precinct Committeemen Election Rules

sentence: This bill would not have been necessary if Katie Hobbs would have taken appropriate measures to be prepared for redistricting during a major election.
author: Jordan Conradson
title: Arizona Legislature Working To Repeal PC Purge Bill – Anti-Precinct Committeemen Elections HB2839
